Articles.Content:
Hey Devs!

When you'll have sorted your most pressing issues and features, will it possible to integrate things more or less in the spirit of what's listed below please?  

 

1-Can you add the equivalent of the Chatterer mod in  KSP2 vanilla? I really the ambiance it created in KSP1.

2- Will it be possible to have something equivalent to the Parallax mod in terms of terrain definition? Ok I've been only on the Mün, but the ground "texture" (I'm no developer) was making it very dull.

3- Life support , space weather and radiations like in Kerbalism. May be as a difficulty level? I really found life support add a level of depth to KSP1. Player needed to plan adequately the trips, add sufficient space in order to end Tincan space exploration, food, water, recyclers, shield or not the ships. It was very interesting.
